Empathy 1.0 documentation
previous | next | modules | index

dataaccess module¶

class dataaccess.DataAccess[source]¶

Bases: object

Main class for accessing the database.

Allows for default values if database connection is impossible and offers rudimentary error handling.

classmethod _getSavedSetting(requestedSetting)[source]¶

Internal method for retreiving data from Saved Settings table

Parameters:requestedSetting (string) – name of the column containing the setting to retreive
Returns:the value of requested setting from the saved settings
_getSingleString(queryText, *args)[source]¶

Internal method to get single string as a respons from database query.

Parameters:
  • queryText (string) – query for the database
  • args (tuple) – optional - allows for adding arguments for query
Returns:

response from database query
Return type:

string
Raises:

error if query fails
_query(queryText, *args)[source]¶

Internal method for simplifying making queries to database.

Parameters:
  • queryText (string) – query for the database
  • args (tuple) – optional - allows for adding arguments for query
Returns:

cursor after the query
Raises:

database error if cur.execute fails

Internal method for changing data in Saved Settings table
